messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2140
messages.msgSnippet: **If the kids are going to bed at the same time mom and dad are, when do mom and dad have...ummm...well, you know what. ;)** My husband is too tired at bedtime
messages.messageBody:
**If the kids are going to bed at the same time mom and dad are, when do mom
and dad have...ummm...well, you know what. ;)**

My husband is too tired at bedtime to ummm. :) Once my kids were old enought
to not be hovered over we started locking ourselves into our bedroom "to
cuddle". Before that we grabbed whatever time we could.

I don't want to hide from our kids that we have sex, any more than I want to
flaunt it in front of them. It just is. I decided I REALLY didn't want them
thinking that sex is only for young single beautiful people OR criminal
deviants, which is the message of most of popular culture.

Deborah in IL
